collection.name: Warm Mother
collection.openText: I am the perfect mother soft, warm, tender and a mother who loves all her children.

specialTipSize.specialTip: $0 will restore SP but deal RED damage after finishing work. The agent working with $0 will also feel increasingly attatched to $0 with every work.
The amount of SP regenerated will increase with the amount of times an egent has worked with $0.
The RED damage depends on the amount of good PE boxes and the amount of times an agent has worked with $0.
Sending agents to work with different abnormalities resets the physical damage taken but regeneration stays at its current level.
